select count(*) as value from viewApply
mapper.insert: insert into apply(student_id, illustrate, time, remark) values ((select student_id from student where sequence = #{sequence}), #{apply.illustrate}, #{apply.time}, #{apply.remark})
mapper.select: select count(*) as value from examine

select e.examine_id, ss.sequence, ss.name studentName, ss.telephone studentTelephone, t.worknumber, t.teacher_name, t.telephone teacherTelephone, e.state from examine e join teacher t on e.teacher_id = t.teacher_id join (select a.apply_id, s.name, s.sequence, s.telephone from apply a join student s on a.student_id = s.student_id) ss on e.apply_id = ss.apply_id order by e.time desc limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
